/* businessRequest Employee Select (출장신청 사원정보조회) */
SELECT E.EMP_EMNO AS empEmno, #사원번호 E.EMP_NAME AS empName, #사원명 D.DEPT_NAME AS deptName, #부서명 R.RANK_NAME AS rankName #직급명 FROM EMPLOYEE E INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEPT_CODE = E.DEPT_CODE INNER JOIN RANK R ON R.RANK_CODE = E.RANK_CODE
